story.title: #LostKingdomsQS with Jago Cooper
story.description: Following some fascinated tweeters and great feedback during BBC4 #LostKingdoms episodes, Jago Cooper gave up an hour of his time to answer the public's questions in a live Twitter Q&A @britishmuseum.

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

quote.text: Tonight on #LostKingdoms: Jago journeys through Colombian jungles and mountains in search of the truth behind El Dorado http://ow.ly/hbwQj

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: Tonight on #LostKingdoms: Jago journeys through Colombian jungles and mountains in search of the truth behind El Dorado http://t.co/IkuTGoTV

quote.text: Ask Jago Cooper about #LostKingdoms tomorrow between 13.00 & 14.00 GMT in a live Twitter Q&A #LostKingdomsQS

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6

meta.text: Ask Jago Cooper about #LostKingdoms tomorrow between 13.00 & 14.00 GMT in a live Twitter Q&A #LostKingdomsQS

quote.text: Will Jago reveal the secret to his perfectly coiffed quiff or will it remain as mysterious as El Dorado? #LostKingdoms #LostKingdomsQS

user.description: Learning Technologist SOAS U. London, OER advocate & Lecturer in Digital Information for Museums UB. Globetrotter & Malas Pulgas. Personal & terrified account
user.name: Javiera Atenas

meta.text: What is Jago carrying on his backpack? Maybe the @britishmuseum would like to run a competition #lostkingdoms

quote.text: .@jatenas ha ha, lots of useful things for the shoot incluing coca leaves, leatherman, chocolate, notebook, camera etc. cheers, Jago

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@jatenas ha ha, lots of useful things for the shoot incluing coca leaves, leatherman, chocolate, notebook, camera etc. cheers, Jago

quote.text: @britishmuseum Thanks! I had the same question for Dora the explorer but she never answered me back! really enjoyed the #lostkingdoms!

user.description: Learning Technologist SOAS U. London, OER advocate & Lecturer in Digital Information for Museums UB. Globetrotter & Malas Pulgas. Personal & terrified account
user.name: Javiera Atenas

meta.text: @britishmuseum Thanks! I had the same question for Dora the explorer but she never answered me back! really enjoyed the #lostkingdoms!

quote.text: @britishmuseum will there be an episode on Chimu culture? #LostKingdomsQS

user.description: I like to think I am cultured but I still watch Neighbours every day.
user.name: William

meta.text: @britishmuseum will there be an episode on Chimu culture? #LostKingdomsQS

quote.text: .@Will_He_Be_ Yes, indeed. Next Monday will focus on the Chimu which reveals a very different pathway to social complexity. #LostKingdomsQs

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@Will_He_Be_ Yes, indeed. Next Monday will focus on the Chimu which reveals a very different pathway to social complexity. #LostKingdomsQs

quote.text: @britishmuseum Thoroughly enjoying the series, how did you decide which cultures to cover? #LostKingdomsQS

user.description: Your wit makes wise things foolish.
user.name: Lila

meta.text: @britishmuseum Thoroughly enjoying the series, how did you decide which cultures to cover? #LostKingdomsQS

quote.text: .@frogli the most important thing for me was finding cultures that weren't so well known internationally, and also fun places to visit!

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@frogli the most important thing for me was finding cultures that weren't so well known internationally, and also fun places to visit!

user.description: Blethers - (not) pure and (often) simple.
user.name: Fiona

meta.text: @britishmuseum What one item in the museum does Jago think we should see and why? Thanks :) #LostKingdoms

user.name: Fiona

quote.text: @britishmuseum #LostKingdomsQs Will Dr Cooper be doing a second series? We have been glued to this series.

user.description: Husband, father, avid sports fan and hotel broker. All views my own etc
user.name: Robert Stapleton

meta.text: @britishmuseum #LostKingdomsQs Will Dr Cooper be doing a second series? We have been glued to this series.

quote.text: @britishmuseum #LostKingdomsQS Other than the sites/cultures covered in the superb series, where else would you recommend to go in SAmerica?

meta.text: @britishmuseum #LostKingdomsQS Other than the sites/cultures covered in the superb series, where else would you recommend to go in SAmerica?

quote.text: @britishmuseum as an archeologist what do you find most rewarding/enjoy most. Museum curation, field work or even TV presenting?

user.description: I like to think I am cultured but I still watch Neighbours every day.
user.name: William

meta.text: @britishmuseum as an archeologist what do you find most rewarding/enjoy most. Museum curation, field work or even TV presenting?

quote.text: .@Will_He_Be_ definitely excavating and surveying to find new sites in remote places. #lostkingdomsqs

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@Will_He_Be_ definitely excavating and surveying to find new sites in remote places. #lostkingdomsqs

quote.text: @britishmuseum You've shown these egalitarian cultures in SA. Was it is this culture that led to their demise, poor defences?#LostKingdomsQs

user.description: Husband, father, avid sports fan and hotel broker. All views my own etc
user.name: Robert Stapleton

meta.text: @britishmuseum You've shown these egalitarian cultures in SA. Was it is this culture that led to their demise, poor defences?#LostKingdomsQs

quote.text: @britishmuseum do you think the #LostKingdoms have anything to teach our present culture and society?

user.description: Social worker in adult mental health and Approved Mental Health Professional (AMHP) working in the north west of England.
user.name: AMHP/ Social worker

meta.text: @britishmuseum do you think the #LostKingdoms have anything to teach our present culture and society?

quote.text: .@mentalhealth Absolutely. these cultures demonstrate how a fundamentally different framework for social organisation can work successfully

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@mentalhealth Absolutely. these cultures demonstrate how a fundamentally different framework for social organisation can work successfully

quote.text: @britishmuseum has anybody been able to find trace of gold in the Guatavita lake?

user.name: Giovanna

meta.text: @britishmuseum has anybody been able to find trace of gold in the Guatavita lake?

quote.text: .@GF_Andrade There is a great archaeologist from the Museo del Oro called Juan Pablo Quintero who has found lots of things recently actually

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt opens 7 February 2013 http://ow.ly/fzhZD #PompeiiExhibition opens 28 March 2013 http://ow.ly/gVrQ6

quote.text: @british museum How did the Chibchas? travel from Central America to Colombia. How did they cross the Darien and the Andes #LostKingdomsQS

user.description: Wireless industry, business development, business strategy. Passionate about the developing world. Love horses, boats, skiing and above all, children.
user.name: Giovanna

meta.text: @british museum How did the Chibchas? travel from Central America to Colombia. How did they cross the Darien and the Andes #LostKingdomsQS

quote.text: .@GF_Andrade @British very interesting question! we actually don't know if this was a demographic, linguistic or cultural movement
